name: My Little Pony - Chaos Inside
description:
This is either version 2 or 3 of this old project of mine. 

It was going to be a linear 2D platformer, and was my first long term project (about 5 years development), but I decided against continuing the project due to the original property already accomplishing my ideas.

I thought I might as well clean some things up, and publish it as an executable, so that it may be looked at. Besides, it had a rather decent pony character maker.

There were a few versions after this one, but each was either underdeveloped or not really worth it to clean up.
